sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Button, Icon, Tabs } from 'antd' import PollComponent from './components/PollComponent' import QAComponent from './components/QAComponent' const {TabPane} = Tabs export default class DetailWebinarTemplate extends Component { state = { webinarPolls: [] } handleScheduleWebinar = (e) => { this.props.handleChangeDisplay('CREATE', 'Create webinar') this.props.handleChangeSelectedTemplate(e) } render() { const { props: { selectedTemplate } } = this return selectedTemplate ? (
Topic: {selectedTemplate.name} Capacity: Meeting 50 Video: Host {selectedTemplate.hostVideo ? 'On' : 'Off'} Panelists {selectedTemplate.panelistsVideo ? 'On' : 'Off'} Webinar Options: Q&A Enable Practice Session Only authenticated users can join Record the webinar automatically
) : null } }
